charges.charge_description: 46:U.S.C.§70506(b) CONSPIRACY TO POSSESS WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE COCAINE WHILE ON BOARD A VESSEL SUBJECT TO THE JURISDICTION OF THE UNITED STATES(1)
